Package com.AnLa.NET

Class Cloud

java.lang.Object
com.AnLa.NET.Cloud
public class Cloud extends Object
The Cloud class supports connected to your Cloudinary.

  • Constructor Details

    • Cloud

      public Cloud(String Cloud_Name, String API_Key, String API_Secret)
      Create a Cloudinary with full information. Using Cloud Name, API Key, API Secret.
      Parameters:
      Cloud_Name - is your Cloud Name.
      API_Key - is your API Key.
      API_Secret - is your API Secret.
      See Also:
      • Cloud(java.lang.String)

    • Cloud

      public Cloud(String URL)
      Create a Cloudinary with full information. Using API Environment variable.
      Parameters:
      URL - is your CLOUDINARY_URL.
      See Also:
      • Cloud(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String)

  • Method Details

    • getCloudinary

      public final com.cloudinary.Cloudinary getCloudinary()
      Use this method to get your Cloudinary.
      Returns:
      your Cloudinary.

    • FileUpload

      public final String FileUpload(String filePath) throws IOException
      Use this method to upload file into Cloudinary, support image, video, raw, auto.
      Parameters:
      filePath - is a path of file.
      Example "C:/user/Picture/yourFile.png" or "Picture/yourFile.png".
      Returns:
      a URL of file after upload successfully.
      Throws:
      IOException - throw exception if there is an error like no internet connection or cloud does not exist.
      See Also:
      • FileUpload(java.lang.String, java.lang.String)

    • FileUpload

      public final String FileUpload(String filePath, String CloudPath) throws IOException
      Use this method to upload File into your Folder on Cloudinary, support image, video, raw, auto.
      Parameters:
      filePath - is a path of File.
      Example "C:/user/Picture/yourFile.png" or "Picture/yourFile.png".
      CloudPath - is a Path of Folder on Cloudinary.
      Example "Picture/" or "myFloder/Picture/".
      Returns:
      a URL of File after upload successfully.
      Throws:
      IOException - throw exception if there is an error like no internet connection or cloud does not exist.
      See Also:
      • FileUpload(java.lang.String)

    • FileDeleteByURL

      public final void FileDeleteByURL(String url) throws IOException
      Use this method to delete your File on Cloudinary by URL.
      Only support image.
      Parameters:
      url - is a URL of File need delete.
      Throws:
      IOException - throw exception if there is an error like no internet connection or cloud does not exist.
      See Also:
      • FileDeleteByID(java.lang.String)

    • FileDeleteByID

      public final void FileDeleteByID(String publicID) throws IOException
      Use this method to delete your File on Cloudinary by Public ID.
      Only support image.
      Parameters:
      publicID - is a Public ID of File need delete.
      Throws:
      IOException - throw exception if there is an error like no internet connection or cloud does not exist.
      See Also:
      • FileDeleteByURL(java.lang.String)
